name: dsquery

procedures: T1069.002::[dsquery] can be used to gather information on permission groups within a domain.
T1082::[dsquery] has the ability to enumerate various information, such as the operating system and host name, for systems within a domain.
T1087.002::[dsquery] can be used to gather information on user accounts within a domain.
T1482::[dsquery] can be used to gather information on domain trusts with dsquery * -filter "(objectClass=trustedDomain)" -attr *.

description: [dsquery](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0105) is a command-line utility that can be used to query Active Directory for information from a system within a domain. (Citation: TechNet Dsquery) It is typically installed only on Windows Server versions but can be installed on non-server variants through the Microsoft-provided Remote Server Administration Tools bundle.
